long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Giveaway Countdown Tracker extension helps you track the time for daily giveaways. It provides a countdown to the next giveaway and displays the exact time when the next set of codes will be available between 5 PM and 9 PM.
